comments.text:
BUILD:  Linux debug build from "Wed May  4 01:56:31 CDT 2005", but with
nsScriptSecurityManager updated to tip.

STEPS TO REPRODUCE:

1)  firefox 'data:text/plain,test'
2)  Wait for firefox to start
3)  Click in content area to focus
4)  Hit Ctrl-T to open new tab
5)  Click on new tab in tab bar to switch to it
6)  Click in new tab content area to focus it.
7)  Hit Ctrl-W to close the tab
8)  Mouse out of window through the left side
9)  Mouse back into window though the left side

EXPECTED RESULTS: nothing

ACTUAL RESULTS:

###!!! ASSERTION: cannot get parentTop: 'parentTop', file
/home/bzbarsky/mozilla/debug/mozilla/dom/src/base/nsGlobalWindow.cpp, line 4287

NOTES:

Before that, when I was messing with tabs, I got:

JavaScript error: , line 0: uncaught exception: [Exception... "Component
returned failure code: 0x80570015 (NS_ERROR_XPC_CI_RETURNED_FAILURE)
[nsIJSCID.createInstance]"  nsresult: "0x80570015
(NS_ERROR_XPC_CI_RETURNED_FAILURE)"  location: "JS frame ::
chrome://global/content/bindings/tabbrowser.xml :: get_fastFind :: line 1569" 
data: no]

Perhaps this is relevant...
comments.creator: bzbarsky@mit.edu

nsScriptSecurityManager updated to tip.

STEPS TO REPRODUCE:

1)  firefox 'data:text/plain,test'

3)  Click in content area to focus

7)  Hit Ctrl-W to close the tab

9)  Mouse back into window though the left side

###!!! ASSERTION: cannot get parentTop: 'parentTop', file

Before that, when I was messing with tabs, I got:

Perhaps this is relevant...

comments.raw_text:
bz, is this by chance related to the --enable-extensions=all bug you filed
around this same time?  Can you still reproduce if you don't build TAF?

around this same time?  Can you still reproduce if you don't build TAF?
